trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> event of a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> de un administrador de serialización.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to resolve object names during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado es utilizado por el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> para resolver los nombres de objeto durante la serialización y deserialización.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following code example attaches a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName> event of a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código en el ejemplo se asocia un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName> eventos de un determinado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>.
